question: Soumitra Chatterjee, who recently passed away, is associated with which field?
explanation:
Legendary Indian actor Soumitra Chatterjee from West Bengal has recently passed away in Kolkata, at the age of 85.
During his six-decade-long career in Bengali language films, he starred more than 300 movies including those filmed by the legendary director Satyajit Ray. He was also a proficient playwright, theatre actor and poet.
